Package com.mostc.pftt.scenario

Different Scenarios to test PHP in

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractApacheScenario Scenarios for testing managing and testing Apache
AbstractCodeCacheScenario  
AbstractDatabaseScenario A Scenario that sets up a database service for (an) extension(s) to test.
AbstractFileSystemScenario  
AbstractIISFastCGIScenario Tests PHP running under Fast-CGI on IIS
AbstractIISScenario Abstract scenario for managing and testing IIS
AbstractODBCScenario  
AbstractParallelScenario A scenario that does not conflict with any other scenario and can be run along with any other scenario.
AbstractSAPIScenario Different scenarios for how PHP can be run CLI - command line, all that has traditionally been tested Builtin-WWW IIS-Express - using IIS Express on Windows Clients IIS-Standard - IIS on Windows Servers mod_php - using Apache's mod_php
AbstractSerialScenario A scenario which multiple instances of the same subclass can not be run simultaneously.
AbstractSMBScenario Scenarios that test PHP using builds and test packs that are stored remotely and accessed using SMB.
AbstractStreamsScenario  
AbstractWebServerScenario  
ApacheModPHPScenario Tests PHP running under Apache's mod_php module.
APCScenario tests the APC code cache (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
BuiltinWWWScenario Tests PHP using PHP 5.4's builtin web server.
CLIScenario Tests the Command Line Interface(CLI) for running PHP.
FTPScenario Scenario that sets up a remote FTP service and has the curl extension tested against it.
HTTPScenario Scenario that sets up a remote HTTP service and has the curl extension tested against it.
IISExpressFastCGIScenario Runs PHP under IIS-Express using FastCGI (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
IISStandardFastCGIScenario Runs PHP under IIS using FastCGI (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
LocalFileSystemScenario Placeholder scenario for storing a PHP build and its test pack on the local file system as opposed to remotely somewhere.
MSAccessScenario Scenario for testing the pdo_odbc and odbc extensions against a Microsoft Access database.
MSSQLODBCScenario Tests the pdo_odbc and odbc extensions against a Microsoft SQL Server.
MSSQLScenario Tests the mssql and pdo_mssql extensions against a Microsoft SQL Server.
MySQLScenario Sets up a MySQL database and tests the mysql, mysqli and pdo_mysql extensions against it.
NoCodeCacheScenario Placeholder scenario for no code caching being used (APC and WinCache not used)
PostgresSQLScenario Tests postgres and pdo_postgres (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
Scenario Scenario to test PHP under.
ScenarioSet A Set of Scenarios to test PHP under.
SMBBasicScenario Tests running a PHP build and its test pack both stored remotely on a basic SMB file share.
SMBBranchCacheScenario Tests using SMB BranchCache support (NOT IMPLEMENTED) Mentioned here for completeness.
SMBCAScenario Tests PHP using SMB Continuous Availability (CA) (NOT IMPLEMENTED) This is a new feature of SMB v3.0 (introduced in Windows 8/2012) which deprecates the DFS concept
SMBCSCScenario Tests PHP using SMB with Client-Side-Caching enabled (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
SMBDeduplicationScenario Tests the new Remote Data Deduplication feature of Windows 2012 using SMB.
SMBDFSScenario Tests PHP with PHP build and test pack being stored remotely on a group of DFS SMB Shares.
SOAPScenario Scenario that sets up a remote SOAP service and has the soap extension tested.
SQLite3Scenario Tests Sqlite3 extension (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
WinCacheScenario Tests the WinCache code caching extension (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
XMLRPCScenario Scenario that sets up a remote XMLRPC service and has the xmlrpc extension tested.
 

Package com.mostc.pftt.scenario Description

Different Scenarios to test PHP in
